title: Barrelchest anchor

Players receive this item in a broken state and must pay Smith on the docks of Mos Le'Harmless a fee of 230,000 coins to repair the anchor. Note that Book o' piracy is needed to properly speak with Smith. If it is lost, players can retrieve another damaged anchor from Brother Tranquility or purchase a repaired one from Perdu for 290,000 coins.

The barrelchest anchor is obtained after killing Barrelchest in The Great Brain Robbery quest. 60 Attack and 40 Strength are required to wield it. Players receive this item in a broken state and must pay Smith on the docks of Mos Le'Harmless a fee of 230,000 coins to repair the anchor. Note that Book o' piracy is needed to properly speak with Smith. If it is lost, players can retrieve another damaged anchor from Brother Tranquility or purchase a repaired one from Perdu for 290,000 coins.

The barrelchest anchor's stats are almost equal to Dharok's greataxe. It is well known as a PKing weapon, used in combos such as anchor to Granite maul specials.

Special attack[edit | edit source]

A player using the barrelchest anchor's special attack, Sunder.

The barrelchest anchor has a special attack, Sunder, which doubles the player's accuracy, increases max damage by 10%, and drains the opponent's combat stats equivalent to 10% of the damage dealt in the following order: Defence, Attack, Ranged, then Magic.[1] This consumes 50% of the player's special attack energy.

Combat styles[edit | edit source]

Category: SpikedCombat StyleStyle typeWeapon StyleExperienceInvisible Boost
PoundCrushAccurateAttack and Hitpoints+3 Attack
PummelCrushAggressiveStrength and Hitpoints+3 Strength
SpikeStabControlledAttack, Strength, Defence, and Hitpoints+1 Attack, Strength, and Defence
BlockCrushDefensiveDefence and Hitpoints+3 Defence

Treasure Trails[edit | edit source]

The barrelchest anchor is the item Falo requires players to show him when he sings about: It can hold down a boat or crush a goat, this object, you see, is quite heavy.

Note: A broken Barrelchest anchor will not work.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
17 July 2014
(update)

The barrelchest anchor is now listed in skill guides.

20 March 2007
(update)
  • The strength bonus was increased from 87 to 100.
  • The crush attack was increased from 80 to 92.
  • The item's value was increased from 50,000 to 230,000.
  • The anchor now costs 230k to repair, instead of 700k.
13 March 2007
(update)
  • The strength bonus was increased to 87.
  • The attack speed was decreased.
  • The "Drop" option was replaced with a "Destroy" option.
  • The anchor now costs 700k to repair, instead of 50k.

References[edit | edit source]

  1. ^ Jagex. Mod Ash's Twitter account. 28 October 2014. (Archived from the original on 26 May 2020.) Mod Ash: "Anchor: 200% accuracy, 110% max hit. Drains one stat by 10% of damage - if Defence is already on 1, it drains Attack, etc."

The '''barrelchest anchor''' is obtained after killing [[Barrelchest]] in [[The Great Brain Robbery]] quest. 60 [[Attack]] and 40 [[Strength]] are required to wield it. Players receive this item in a broken state and must pay [[Smith]] on the docks of [[Mos Le'Harmless]] a fee of 230,000 [[coins]] to repair the anchor. Note that [[Book o' piracy]] is needed to properly speak with Smith. If it is lost, players can retrieve another damaged anchor from [[Brother Tranquility]] or purchase a repaired one from [[Perdu]] for 290,000 coins.

The barrelchest anchor's stats are almost equal to [[Dharok's greataxe]]. It is well known as a [[PKing]] weapon, used in combos such as anchor to [[Granite maul]] [[special attack|specials]].

==Special attack==
[[File:Sunder.gif|thumb|220px|A player using the barrelchest anchor's special attack, ''Sunder''.]]
The barrelchest anchor has a special attack, ''Sunder'', which doubles the player's accuracy, increases max damage by 10%, and drains the opponent's combat stats equivalent to 10% of the damage dealt in the following order: [[Defence]], [[Attack]], [[Ranged]], then [[Magic]].{{CiteTwitter|author=Mod Ash|url=https://twitter.com/JagexAsh/status/527028530203623424|date=28 October 2014|archiveurl=https://archive.is/TPKRd|archivedate=26 May 2020|quote=Anchor: 200% accuracy, 110% max hit. Drains one stat by 10% of damage - if Defence is already on 1, it drains Attack, etc.}} This consumes 50% of the player's special attack energy.
